archiefmat.titel_eng: Documents related to the request for manumission
archiefmat.scope: Contains mainly petitions for manumission, usually accompanied by extracts from the registers of baptism of the various denominations stating that the slave is baptized and extracts from the slave registers concerning among other things ownership and the ability of the slave to earn a living after he is manumitted. It also contains resolutions in which manumission is permitted.
archiefmat.notes:
Period: July 1860 - April 1863.

The numbers of the inventory items may be changed (November 2008).
archiefmat.Aantekeningen: NB de nummering kan mogelijk nog wijzigen; het archief wordt op dit moment (november 2008) omgenummerd. Later nazien!
